setter_tooltip.parse_value: JSON, CSV, TSV, Excel 및 TXT 파일을 지원하여 선택한 파일의 구문 분석을 시도합니다. 구문 분석된 데이터는 {{uploader1.parsedValue}}를 통해 액세스할 수 있습니다. 구문 분석할 수 없는 파일은 배열에서 null이 됩니다. 모든 파일은 이 옵션에 관계없이 값 배열에서 base64로 인코딩된 문자열로 사용할 수 있습니다.
setter_tooltip.file_url: 웹에서 PDF URL 또는 pdf 파일의 base64 인코딩 데이터를 지원합니다. 예: {{ data:application/pdf;base64, example-data }}
setter_tooltip.scale: 각 페이지의 크기를 조정하여 구성 요소의 너비 또는 높이를 채웁니다.
setter_tooltip.scroll: 스크롤 시 자동으로 각 페이지의 시작 부분으로 이동합니다.
setter_tooltip.video_url: 대부분의 비디오 서비스 또는 일반적인 비디오 파일 유형에 대한 직접 링크를 지원합니다 또는 비디오 파일의 base64 인코딩 데이터. 예: {{ data:audio/mp4;base64,exampleDate}}

collapse.type: 접을 수 있는 목록: 목록에서 모든 항목은 첫 번째 항목의 스타일을 자동으로 복사합니다. {{ currentItem.columnName }}을 통해 각 항목의 구성 요소 데이터를 지정할 수 있습니다. 접을 수 있는 패널: 각 패널은 독립적이며 각 항목의 구성 요소 스타일과 데이터를 개별적으로 지정할 수 있습니다.

setter_tooltip.message: To retrieve the content of the message from a specific field in the data source, such as the content field, you can set it as {{item.content}}.
setter_tooltip.message_type: To set the type of the message based on a specific field in the data source, such as the type field, you can set it as {{item.type}}. We support these types: text, image, video, and audio.
setter_tooltip.message_id: 각 메시지에 대한 고유 ID를 설정하려면 데이터 소스의 특정 필드에서 검색할 수 있습니다. id 필드에서 가져오려면 {{item.id}}로 설정할 수 있습니다.
setter_tooltip.replayMessageId: 지정된 메시지에 회신하는 경우 이 필드를 사용하여 회신할 메시지를 설정합니다.

setter_tooltip.sendTimeFormat: 보내는 시간의 형식을 설정합니다. 예: hh:MM:ss.

setter_tooltip.showSendTime: Set whether to show the send time
setter_tooltip.showFooter: Set whether to show the footer
setter_tooltip.senderAvatar: Set the sender avatar. For example, in your data source, the sender avatar is the sendAvatar field and you can set the field to {{item.sendAvatar}}.
setter_tooltip.receiving: Set whether to display loading when receiving messages. If your message is received from action1, you can set it to {{action1.isRunning}}, and the loading status will be displayed when action1 is running.

chat.data_source: The data source of the chat component. Use {{actionName.data}} to use the data from your databases or APIs
chat.enable_message_selec: Set whether to allow a message to be selected
chat.selection_type: Set how to select a message, left-click or right-click. When used on a mobile device, it is clicked to trigger the selection.

chat.image_background: Set a image background. Base64 and image URL are supported

setter_tips.carousel_tips: {{ item }}을 사용하여 데이터 소스에서 값을 가져옵니다. 예를 들어, 데이터 소스에 두 개의 속성이 있습니다. 그들은 imageUrl과 url입니다. 이미지 클릭 시 다른 url로 이동하고 싶다면 {{ item.url }}을 이용하여 url을 설정하세요.

variable.available_in_objects:
개체 및 배열에서 사용할 수 있습니다. 개체 형식으로 변수 값을 설정하려면 attributeName을 사용합니다. 예를 들어 {"a":1, "b":2}에서 "b" 값을 변경하려면 경로
  b여야 합니다.

변수의 값을 배열 형식으로 설정하려면 {{index}}를 사용하십시오. 예를 들어 "d"를 "t" ["a","b","c","d"]로 변경하려면 경로는 {{ 3 }} 또는 {{globalData.state1.indexOf("d ")}}.

eventCalendar.resource_id: 리소스는 사람, 회의실 등이 될 수 있습니다. 리소스 ID를 설정하고 이벤트에 연결할 수 있습니다.

table.index: 선택하려는 행의 인덱스입니다. 인덱스는 여러 행을 지정하는 데 사용할 수 있는 배열이어야 합니다.
table.show_thousands_separ: Whether to show the thousands separator
table.tag_label: Set the label of tags. An array will be separated to multiple tags.
table.tag_color: Set the color of tags. Use {{ write a conditional statement to set the color displayed by each tag under different conditions.
table.sort_by_mapped_value: Whether to sort by mapped value. If not, we will sort based on the original data.
table.background: Set the background of column. Use {{ write a conditional statement to set the color displayed by each cell under different conditions.
table.alignment: Set the alignment of the column.
table.column_width: Set column width by numeric value. You can also adjust the column width by dragging in the frame. After adjustment, the value of this configuration item will also change accordingly
table.width: Set the adaptation method of column width.
table.disable_user_selecti: 사용자 선택을 비활성화할지 여부입니다. 비활성화하면 이벤트 핸들러로 테이블 구성 요소를 제어하여 행을 선택할 수 있습니다.
table.refresh: Whether to show the refresh icon.
table.download_row_data: 원시 데이터 다운로드 아이콘 표시 여부입니다.
table.column_setting: 열 설정을 표시할지 여부입니다. 열 설정을 통해 사용자는 표시할 열과 열 정렬을 설정할 수 있습니다. 이 설정은 테이블 데이터를 변경하지 않습니다.
table.cell_overflow: How to display when cell overflow.
table.total_row_count: The number of rows used to count the page number.
table.next_cursor: An identifier used to locate the next starting point of a set of data, in order to paginate and retrieve data in batches
table.has_next_page: A boolean used to indicate whether there is another page of data available. It can help us better control data retrieval in paginated queries and optimize query performance
table.filters: An array of object enclosed in {{ }}. For example, {{ [{"**id**":"name of the column to filter", "**value**":"the value to match", "**filterFn**":"contains, equals, ..."}] }}. We support these filterFn: "equalTo", "notEqualTo", "contains", "doesNotContain", "lessThan", "notLessThan", "moreThan", "notMoreThan", "empty", "notEmpty", "before", "after".
table.supported_in_the_row: 행 단일 선택 모드에서 지원됩니다. 활성화 후 표 이외의 영역을 클릭하면 행 선택이 해제됩니다.

drive_builder.allow_public_use: Set whether to use in public app. When used in a public app, in order to protect your file security, it will only be able to access the PublicAccess folder
drive_builder.illa_drive_folder: To specify a folder, users can only select files from this folder when using this component
drive_builder.generate_signed_url: To set whether to generate a signed URL. All users can reach the file via a signed URL. This is usually used when you need to display content on your website or allow users to download it.
drive_builder.expired_time: To set the expired time. When expired, the signed URL will be unaccessiable.
drive_builder.time: Use the number type in seconds to set the expiration time. For example, {{300}} (which means 300 seconds or 5 minutes)
drive_builder.turn_on_hotlink: To set whether turn on the hotlink protect. If you turned on it, the file will only be accessed via the website on illacloud.com
drive_builder.button_text: To set the text on the button
drive_builder.selection_type: Set whether to allow the user to select a single file or multiple files
drive_builder.allowed_file_types: Use a string array to set the allowed file types, such as allowing jpg and png, fill in {{[".jpg", ".png"]}}. Leave blank to allow all file types.
drive_builder.file_list: To set whether to show the selected file list.
drive_builder.min_size: To set the allowed minimum file size
drive_builder.max_size: To set the allowed maximum file size
drive_builder.min_file_num: To set the minimum number of files allowed to be selected
drive_builder.max_file_num: To set the maximum number of files allowed to be selected
drive_builder.file_name_duplicatio: To set how to handle duplicate filenames. In the case of keep both, a random string will be added to the file name uploaded.
drive_builder.fileData: Set the file data using an object array, the format of the object is {"fileName":"the name", "FileID":"the ID"}. You can use the Drive file picker component to select files and set this value directly through {{filePciker1.value}}.
drive_builder.downloadZIP: To set whether to download the files as one ZIP.

chart.stack_grouped_data: Values from different groups with the same X-axis value will be stacked in a stacked chart. Stacked charts can be used to compare the overall size of different categories or groups, as well as the relative sizes of individual subcategories or subgroups.
chart.x-axis_type: Setting the chart type can enhance data readability.

chart.legend_position: To set the position of legent.

grid_list.column_adaptation:
In Auto mode, the number of columns remains fixed while the column width is adjustable. Resizing the browser window will change the column width accordingly.
In Fixed mode, the number of columns is not fixed while the column width remains constant. Resizing the browser window will alter the number of columns.
grid_list.column_count: Used to configure the number of columns, which determines how many grids are displayed per row.
grid_list.row_height: Used to configure the height of each row. In Auto mode, the height is adaptive, and the row height is determined by the tallest grid in the current row. In Fixed mode, the row height is fixed, and all grids have the same height.
grid_list.item_radius: Used to configure the corner radius of each grid
grid_list.item_shadow: Used to configure the shadow size of each grid
grid_list.item_spacing: Used to configure the spacing between grids
grid_list.max_column_count: Set the maximum number of columns that can be displayed in the Grid list component as its width increases. When the maximum number of columns is reached and the canvas width continues to increase, the column width will be increased to accommodate the layout, and the number of columns will not increase further.

description.update_plan_monthly: Starting from the next period, the subscription will be changed to a monthly subscription, and the fees will be automatically deducted based on the monthly subscription pricing. If you wish to reduce licenses or make other changes to the subscription, please update it before the start of the next period. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>
description.add_license: Calculation rules using a monthly seat subscription as an example: Let's consider a scenario where you initially subscribed to 5 seats starting from March 14th, and the billing cycle spans from the 14th of this month to the 13th of next month. On May 10th, you decide to add 1 additional seats. At that point, there were 4 days remaining until the end of the current cycle on May 13th (which totals 30 days from April 14th to May 13th). To calculate the adjusted payment, we will deduct the cost of 1 seat, which amounts to approximately $10, proportionate to the duration of 4 days within the 30-day cycle. Therefore, the deduction is estimated as 1 seat * $10 / 30 days * 4 days, resulting in approximately $1.33. Starting from the next billing cycle, all seat fees will be consolidated and paid together. If you wish to reduce seats or make other changes to the subscription, please update it before the start of the next period. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>
description.remove_license: If the number of users with editing permissions exceeds the number of licenses at the start of the next billing cycle, all users except the owner will be disabled until you remove members or increase the number of licenses within the available range. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>
description.add_traffic: After successful deduction, your traffic will increase in real-time. Once the traffic is used, the fees cannot be refunded. Unused traffic can be refunded in units of GB. For example, if you purchase 10GB of traffic and use 4.5GB, you can apply for a refund of 5GB. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>
description.subscribe_storage_yearly: You are going to subscribe to the annual subscription of ILLA Drive storage. We will automatically deduct the fees from your account at the beginning of each payment cycle. The actual amount deducted depends on how much storage capacity you have subscribed in GB. For example, if you start your first subscription on February 25, 2023, with an annual subscription fee of $9.9 per GB, and you have a total of 3 GB, we will deduct $29.7 on February 25, 2023. If you add 2 GB on March 25, 2023, we will first deduct the remaining 11 months' payment on March 25, 2023. Then, by February 25, 2024, we will deduct the payment for 5 GB, which is (2+3)*$9.9=$49.5. If you wish to reduce storage or make other changes to the subscription, please update it before the start of the next period. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>
description.subscribe_license_monthly: You are going to subscribe to the monthly subscription of ILLA Cloud Plus. We will automatically deduct the fees from your account at the beginning of each payment cycle. The actual amount deducted depends on the number of licenses you have. For example, if you start your first subscription on February 25, 2023, with an monthly subscription fee of $12 per license, and you have a total of 3 licenses, we will deduct $36 on February 25, 2023. If you add 2 more licenses on March 21, 2023, we will first deduct the remaining 5 days' payment on March 21, 2023. Then, by March 25, 2023, we will deduct the payment for 5 licenses, which is (2+3)*$12=$60. If you wish to reduce licenses or make other changes to the subscription, please update it before the start of the next period. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>
description.update_plan_increase_license: The fees will be automatically deducted based on the updated number of seats and the pricing of new billing cycle from the next period. This time, we will deduct the payment for the increased seats according to the current billing cycle. Calculation rules of increasing seats using a monthly seat subscription as an example: Let's consider a scenario where you initially subscribed to 5 seats starting from March 14th, and the billing cycle spans from the 14th of this month to the 13th of next month. On May 10th, you decide to add 1 additional seat. At that point, there were 4 days remaining until the end of the current cycle on May 13th (which totals 30 days from April 14th to May 13th). To calculate the adjusted payment, we will deduct the cost of 1 seat, which amounts to approximately $10, proportionate to the duration of 4 days within the 30-day cycle. Therefore, the deduction is estimated as 1 seat * $10 / 30 days * 4 days, resulting in approximately $1.33. Starting from the next billing cycle, all seat fees will be consolidated and paid together. If you wish to reduce seats or make other changes to the subscription, please update it before the start of the next period. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>

If the number of users with editing permissions exceeds the number of licenses at the start of the next billing cycle, all users except the owner will be disabled until you remove members or increase the number of licenses within the available range. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>
description.update_plan_remove_storage: The fees will be automatically deducted based on the updated storage and the pricing of new billing cycle from the next period. If the storage capacity occupied by your files exceeds the subscribed storage capacity at the start of the next billing cycle, all files will be disabled until you delete files or increase the storage capacity within the available range. For more information, please refer to our <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1>
